patthana15.55:4.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.55:5.1: Dassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbahetuko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.55:6.1: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nanadassanena pahātabbahetuko naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.55:6.2: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate tīṇi.
